en.DASHBOARD_ONBOARDING_GET_STARTED: Here are your first steps to get started:
en.DASHBOARD_ONBOARDING_STEP1: 1. Go to $SETTINGS and set up your user information. (This is important so we know who collected the data we receive.)
en.DASHBOARD_ONBOARDING_STEP2: 2. Click on $DATA_ENTRY and start collecting data. (You don't need an internet connection. The data is stored locally on your phone.)
en.DASHBOARD_ONBOARDING_STEP3: 3. When you have an internet connection, come back and go to $UPLOAD. Then click on the Upload button to send your collected data to us.
en.DASHBOARD_DONT_FORGET_UPLOAD_SG: Don't forget: You have one data item that has not yet been uploaded.
en.DASHBOARD_DONT_FORGET_UPLOAD_PL: Don't forget: You have $COUNT data items that have not yet been uploaded.
en.SETTINGS_EMAIL: Email (so we can get in touch)
en.SETTINGS_TOKEN_EXPLANATION: The token is used for signing data entries. You can get one from the Love The Oceans staff.
